block.p: APPLIED MICROBIOLOGY INC., New York, appointed Fredric Price president and chief executive. BARNEYS NEW YORK promoted Simon Doonan, its senior vice president in charge of advertising and display, to senior vice president of creative services, adding publicity and store design to his responsibilities. Publicity was previously handled by Mallory Andrews, who has resigned to pursue other interests, the company said yesterday.

APPLIED MICROBIOLOGY INC., New York, appointed Fredric Price president and chief executive. BARNEYS NEW YORK promoted Simon Doonan, its senior vice president in charge of advertising and display, to senior vice president of creative services, adding publicity and store design to his responsibilities. Publicity was previously handled by Mallory Andrews, who has resigned to pursue other interests, the company said yesterday.

BROOKSTONE INC. Nashua, N.H., named Michael Anthony, previously president of Lechters Inc., president. Steen Kanter, chief executive of Lechters, will take over Mr. Anthony's duties. DIAGNOSTIC PRODUCTS CORP., Los Angeles, promoted Michael Ziering, its vice president of administration, to president, succeeding Sidney Aroesty, who resigned. MILLICOM INTERNATIONAL CELLULAR New York, a unit of Millicom Inc., promoted J. Shelby Bryan, president and chief executive, to vice chairman. Jeremy W. Metcalfe, executive vice president, was promoted to Mr. Bryan's former position. TAMBRANDS INC. White Plains, named Michael K. Lorelli president of North America-Latin America and executive vice president of the corporation. He has been president of Pizza Hut International, a division of Pepsico Inc. TURNER INTERNATIONAL INC., Atlanta, the international sales and distribution arm of Turner Broadcasting System Inc., named Robert W. Ross president.
